modes.title: Oscillatory Behavior (Hopf Bifurcation)
modes.description:
b > a^2 + 1
Behavior: The system exhibits sustained oscillations.

modes.title: Pattern Formation (Turing Instability)
modes.description:
b > a^2 + 1 and n = d1/d0 > 1 + a^2 - b/a^2
Behavior: The system forms spatial patterns due to diffusion-driven instability.

modes.title: Critical Point (Threshold of Oscillations)
modes.description:
b = a^2 + 1
Behavior: The system is at the threshold of oscillations.

modes.title: Stable Steady State
modes.description:
b < a^2 + 1
Behavior: The system reaches a stable steady state without oscillations.
